text: Nagahira Okabe (born 10 August 1913) was a Japanese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Nagahira Okabe
